personalInfo.name: Diana Keffer
personalInfo.title: Bilingual Legal Support Professional
personalInfo.subtitle: Administrative Specialist | English & Spanish Fluency
personalInfo.tagline: Detail-Oriented Administrative Professional | Bilingual Client Communication Expert | Ready to Support Legal Operations
personalInfo.availability: Available immediately for full-time position in Houston, TX (77046 area)

professionalSummary.headline: Experienced Bilingual Administrative Professional Ready for Legal Support Role
professionalSummary.description: Highly organized and detail-oriented administrative professional with over 12 years of experience in office operations, client relations, and document management. Fully bilingual in English and Spanish, enabling seamless communication with diverse client bases. Proven track record of following direction precisely, accepting constructive feedback, and thriving in fast-paced environments. Extensive experience handling sensitive information, managing multiple priorities, and maintaining professional communication across all channels. Background includes office administration in regulated industries, customer account management, and operational support roles requiring accuracy and discretion. Ready to apply strong administrative skills and bilingual capabilities to support legal teams in drafting documents, communicating with clients and insurance companies, and managing case-related tasks.
keyStrengths: Full fluency in English and Spanish for client and insurance company communication
Proven ability to follow direction precisely and implement constructive feedback
Strong multitasking capabilities in deadline-driven, fast-paced environments
Experience managing confidential information with professional discretion
Excellence in document management, data entry, and administrative support
Professional communication skills across phone, email, and in-person interactions
Track record of supporting supervisors and teams with assigned tasks
Detail-oriented approach ensuring accuracy in all work products
